articles.title: No, that wasn't Liam Conejo Ramos in Bad Bunny's Super Bowl halftime show - NPR
articles.description: A publicist for Bad Bunny confirmed to NPR that the little boy in a blue bunny hat detained by ICE in Minneapolis last month did not participate in the Super Bowl halftime show.
articles.content:
Around the middle of Bad Bunny's live NFL Super Bowl halftime performance, the Puerto Rican singer is seen handing a Grammy Award to a young Latino boy.
